name: UITextViewDelegate
desc: The methods for receiving editing-related messages for text view objects.

items.name: func textViewShouldBeginEditing(UITextView) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to begin editing in the specified text view.

items.name: func textViewDidBeginEditing(UITextView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when editing of the specified text view begins.

items.name: func textViewShouldEndEditing(UITextView) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to stop editing in the specified text view.

items.name: func textViewDidEndEditing(UITextView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when editing of the specified text view ends.

items.name: func textView(UITextView, shouldChangeTextIn: NSRange, replacementText: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to replace the specified text in the text view.

items.name: func textViewDidChange(UITextView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the user changes the text or attributes in the specified text view.

items.name: func textViewDidChangeSelection(UITextView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the text selection changes in the specified text view.

items.name: func textView(UITextView, shouldInteractWith: NSTextAttachment, in: NSRange, interaction: UITextItemInteraction) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified text view allows the specified type of user interaction with the provided text attachment in the specified range of text.

items.name: func textView(UITextView, shouldInteractWith: URL, in: NSRange, interaction: UITextItemInteraction) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified text view allows the specified type of user interaction with the specified URL in the specified range of text.

items.name: enum UITextItemInteraction
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of interaction the user expects to have with a URL or text attachment.
